# VisionResult.recognizeText(_:_:)

**Case**

A result from performing a recognize text request.

## Declaration

```swift
case recognizeText(RecognizeTextRequest, [RecognizedTextObservation])
```

## Getting the text result

- **VisionResult.detectTextRectangles(_:_:)**: A result from performing a detect text rectangles request.
